header.title: Privacy Policy
header.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: exit1.dev ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our uptime monitoring service.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.description: When you create an account, we collect:

oauthInfo.title: Third-Party Authentication
oauthInfo.description: When you sign in using Google, GitHub, or Slack (OAuth), we do not store your passwords or personal data from these services. We only receive and store:
items: Your email address (if provided by the service)
A unique identifier to link your account

serviceData.title: Service Usage Data
serviceData.description: We collect minimal data necessary to provide our uptime monitoring service:
items: URLs of websites you want to monitor
Logs of monitoring activities (for debugging and service improvement)

technicalInfo.title: Technical Information
technicalInfo.description: We automatically collect certain technical information:
items: IP address (for security and abuse prevention)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our uptime monitoring service
Process your account registration and authentication
Send you important service notifications and updates
Respond to your support requests and inquiries
Improve our service and develop new features

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.description: We may share data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our service (e.g., Clerk for authentication, hosting providers)

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.description: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and safety

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred

items.title: Consent:
items.description: We may share information with your explicit consent

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
items: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS/SSL
Passwords are hashed using industry-standard algorithms
We use Clerk for secure authentication and session management
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Access controls and authentication requirements for all systems

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services:

items.title: Account Data:
items.description: Retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period after deletion

items.title: Service Data:
items.description: Retained for the duration of your service usage

items.title: Logs:
items.description: Retained for up to 12 months for security and debugging purposes

items.title: Analytics:
items.description: Anonymized data may be retained indefinitely for service improvement

accessControl.title: Access and Control
items: Delete your account and associated data

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion
accountDeletion.description: You can delete your account at any time through your account settings. Upon deletion, we will:
items: Remove your personal information from our active systems
Delete your monitoring configurations and data
Retain certain information as required by law or for legitimate business purposes

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.additionalInfo: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling certain cookies may affect service functionality.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: Our service integrates with the following third-party services:

items.title: Analytics Services:
items.description: For service improvement and performance monitoring

thirdParty.additionalInfo: These services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review them.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
